targets.query: SELECT 100-sum("lost")/sum("snt")*100 FROM (SELECT min("loss")*mean("snt")/100 as lost, mean("snt") as snt FROM /^$host$/ WHERE time > now() - 14d GROUP BY time(40s) fill(null))
SELECT 100-sum("lost")/sum("snt")*100 FROM (SELECT min("loss")*mean("snt")/100 as lost, mean("snt") as snt FROM /^$host$/ WHERE time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time(40s) fill(null))

panels.description:
Plot of minimum value of loss % for granulation set in grafana.

Minimum value displays the true packet loss on a selected route

targets.query: SELECT 100-sum("lost")/sum("snt")*100 FROM (SELECT min("loss")*mean("snt")/100 as lost, mean("snt") as snt FROM /^$host$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(40s) fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: SLA

targets.query: SELECT 100-sum("lost")/sum("snt")*100 FROM (SELECT min("loss")*mean("snt")/100 as lost, mean("snt") as snt FROM /^$host$/ WHERE time > now() - 14d GROUP BY time(40s) fill(null))
SELECT 100-sum("lost")/sum("snt")*100 FROM (SELECT min("loss")*mean("snt")/100 as lost, mean("snt") as snt FROM /^$host$/ WHERE time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time(40s) fill(null))
SELECT 100-sum("lost")/sum("snt")*100 FROM (SELECT min("loss")*mean("snt")/100 as lost, mean("snt") as snt FROM /^$host$/ WHERE time > now() - 14d GROUP BY time(40s) fill(null))
SELECT 100-sum("lost")/sum("snt")*100 FROM (SELECT min("loss")*mean("snt")/100 as lost, mean("snt") as snt FROM /^$host$/ WHERE time > now() - 1d GROUP BY time(40s) fill(null))

SELECT mean("loss") FROM "8.8.8.8" WHERE ("hop" <> '01-???' AND "hop" <> '01-_gateway' AND "hop" <> '02-89-72-16-1.dynamic.chello.pl' AND "hop" <> '02-???') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(none)
SELECT max("loss") FROM (SELECT min("loss") as loss FROM /^$host$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(40s) fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: Median MTR for hops from 3rd, because ISPs tend to cut off ICMP protocol in their servers - so the data isn't reliable for the first two hops.

targets.query: SELECT median("loss") FROM /^$host$/ WHERE ("hop" !~ /^01-.*/ AND "hop" !~ /^02-.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hop" fill(null)

panels.title: Median MTR
